what do you think about Neo it's it's a oneof a kind company well I actually just made an update video recently on Neo so please feel free to check it out I go into detail why the stock is rising and even what differentiates them but yeah like you said they have some unique qualities that help them stand out obviously they're in China so it's like a Chinese kind of version of Tesla cars in a way but they also do battery swaps which no one else I believe really does and they recently launched an even cheaper sub brand with plans to launch another even cheaper sub brand than that uh by next year so I actually really like what Neo is doing and I think they have potential to expand internationally too a concern there though is tariffs with International expansion but you know as a higher risk speculative type of stock I like them more than most and I actually do own a very small amount of it in my personal portfolio we don't have it in the community one but I'll be sure to include them in a future poll when we look at any new stocks to add and you guys can vote on it.

Pajero lad who says I'd also love if you could do a video on some mining stocks like Veil Alber maral and Rio Tinto so that's actually in response to another comment from last month's video where someone asked about Veil and I said there that I would consider doing a video on some mining stocks mostly because I'm interested in ones with ties to EVs and batteries so like Cobalt Mining and lithium and that type of stuff but I'm also interested in gold mining stocks too and maybe even Diamond stocks so there's a lot there that kind of interests me that I would love to make videos on by the way a long time ago I had actually owned a a gold mining stock but it was many years ago and I eventually sold out of it because I felt like I just wasn't knowledgeable enough about it but I would love to do some new updated research on these markets and these companies and maybe I could put out like a best mining stocks type of video for you guys I think that would be a lot of fun.

what's your opinion on red wire uh RDW well first of all thank you for the nice comment I really appreciate that and I'm glad that you're enjoying the channel as for red wire this is a bit of a speculative company in that they're not yet profitable but they're very interesting they're space related company that just barely ipoed in 2021 and they provide Hardware software and other related services for space missions and more recently they've been getting more attention for entering the satellite Thruster Market which is supposed to be very large and growing there's a ton of demand for them with the US space force alone wanting to put up now hundreds of missile detection and tracking satellites in into orbit which by the way many of those get replaced every few years so the demand could be like hundreds of thrusters maybe per month According to some estimates which would equate to hundreds of millions of dollars in new revenue for this company which by the way they recently also made an acquisition in Hera systems to expand their portfolio in these areas even further and while the stock had risen already a lot this past year on all of that hype well it's still down about a quarter of its value since IPO with a pretty reasonable PS ratio of less than two considering that their cash flows are also improving so all of this to say that for being a higher risk kind of speculative stock I actually kind of like red wire I don't own it but I do look them up on occasion I do enjoy tracking it and I'm actually thinking about making a bigger overall kind of broader video diving into space related companies and stocks so maybe I'll talk more about them in in that video but it's definitely a very interesting Spec stock to keep track of and like I said I want to do more videos on space exploration stocks and other related stocks too.
